Description: Handles surgical procedures including preoperative, operative, and postoperative care.
Provides diagnosis and treatment for a wide range of adult illnesses and conditions.
Specializes in the treatment of skin, hair, and nail conditions.
Focuses on oral health, including teeth, gums, and related structures.
Deals with disorders of the heart and blood vessels.
Specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer.
Cares for the musculoskeletal system, including bones, joints, ligaments, and muscles.
Focuses on disorders of the nervous system including the brain, spinal cord, and nerves.
Provides immediate medical attention for urgent and life-threatening conditions.
Addresses mental health issues and promotes psychological well-being.
